page.title: 07ALL SAINTS SCHOOL (CONT'D)
page.content: The children usually walk to school from the old village but those who live further away come in cars. The school has a recorder group with clarinets, and a choir. They have art/craft, computer, cricket, and bird watching clubs.In P.E.they have teams Red,Yellow,Blue and Green. The subjects taught are: Maths,English,Science,History,Topics and R.E. They use the church on festival days and for special services. The school also has a tuck shop. Every year 20 new boys and girls can start at school. The school day starts at 10 to 9 and finishes at 3.25 pm. It was opened in 1877.The extension was built in 1966.When the children leave the school they go to the {King Ecgbert School.}In winter the children and the teachers have
